languages.text: Даже следуя координатам Риззы, вам с трудом удается обнаружить тщательно спрятанный схрон. Среди руин погибшей столетия назад колонии возвышается полуразрушенная статуя Императора. В ее основании и находится замаскированный проход в тайник. Внутри обнаруживается груз священных реликвий Империума.

traits.locale_text: Даже следуя координатам Риззы, вам с трудом удается обнаружить тщательно спрятанный схрон. Среди руин погибшей столетия назад колонии возвышается полуразрушенная статуя Императора. В ее основании и находится замаскированный проход в тайник. Внутри обнаруживается груз священных реликвий Империума.

languages.text: Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.
languages.original_text: Даже следуя координатам Риззы, вам с трудом удается обнаружить тщательно спрятанный схрон. Среди руин погибшей столетия назад колонии возвышается полуразрушенная статуя Императора. В ее основании и находится замаскированный проход в тайник. Внутри обнаруживается груз священных реликвий Империума.

traits.locale_text: Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a colony that died centuries ago. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a colony that died centuries ago. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

languages.text: 即使有了莱萨给出的坐标，你也差一点就没发现那些精心隐藏的宝藏。一座破败的帝皇雕像矗立在早已死亡的殖民地废墟中，雕像底部有一条通往藏宝地的隐蔽通道，你在里面发现了一批帝国的圣物。
languages.original_text: Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

traits.locale_text: 即使有了莱萨给出的坐标，你也差一点就没发现那些精心隐藏的宝藏。一座破败的帝皇雕像矗立在早已死亡的殖民地废墟中，雕像底部有一条通往藏宝地的隐蔽通道，你在里面发现了一批帝国的圣物。

languages.text: ライザから与えられた座標をたどっても、慎重に選ばれた隠し場所を見つけるのがやっとだった。長い年月を経たコロニーの廃墟の中に、朽ち果てた皇帝の像が立っている。その根元には見かけを偽装された隠し場所への通路がある。中には帝国の神聖な遺物が積まれている。
languages.original_text: Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

traits.locale_text: ライザから与えられた座標をたどっても、慎重に選ばれた隠し場所を見つけるのがやっとだった。長い年月を経たコロニーの廃墟の中に、朽ち果てた皇帝の像が立っている。その根元には見かけを偽装された隠し場所への通路がある。中には帝国の神聖な遺物が積まれている。

languages.text: Incluso siguiendo las coordenadas dadas por Ryzza, a duras penas consigues encontrar el alijo cuidadosamente escondido. Una ruinosa estatua del Emperador se alza entre las ruinas de una colonia muerta hace largo tiempo. En su base hay un pasadizo oculto hacia el alijo. En su interior se encuentra un cargamento de reliquias sagradas del Imperium.
languages.original_text: Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

traits.locale_text: Incluso siguiendo las coordenadas dadas por Ryzza, a duras penas consigues encontrar el alijo cuidadosamente escondido. Una ruinosa estatua del Emperador se alza entre las ruinas de una colonia muerta hace largo tiempo. En su base hay un pasadizo oculto hacia el alijo. En su interior se encuentra un cargamento de reliquias sagradas del Imperium.

languages.text: Obwohl du den Koordinaten folgst, die Ryzza dir gegeben hat, gelingt es dir nur Mühe, das sorgfältig versteckte Lager zu finden. Eine heruntergekommene Statue des Imperators steht in den Ruinen einer seit langem toten Kolonie. An ihrem Fuß befindet sich ein versteckter Gang zu dem Lager. Darin befinden sich heilige Relikte des Imperiums.
languages.original_text: Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

traits.locale_text: Obwohl du den Koordinaten folgst, die Ryzza dir gegeben hat, gelingt es dir nur Mühe, das sorgfältig versteckte Lager zu finden. Eine heruntergekommene Statue des Imperators steht in den Ruinen einer seit langem toten Kolonie. An ihrem Fuß befindet sich ein versteckter Gang zu dem Lager. Darin befinden sich heilige Relikte des Imperiums.

languages.text: Vous avez beau suivre à la lettre les coordonnées transmises par Ryzza, c'est à grand-peine que vous parvenez à trouver la cachette savamment dissimulée. Une statue délabrée de l'Empereur trône au milieu des ruines d'une colonie désertée depuis longtemps. À sa base est aménagé un passage secret menant à la cachette. À l'intérieur, une cargaison de reliques sacrées d'origine impériale.
languages.original_text: Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez beau suivre à la lettre les coordonnées transmises par Ryzza, c'est à grand-peine que vous parvenez à trouver la cachette savamment dissimulée. Une statue délabrée de l'Empereur trône au milieu des ruines d'une colonie désertée depuis longtemps. À sa base est aménagé un passage secret menant à la cachette. À l'intérieur, une cargaison de reliques sacrées d'origine impériale.

languages.text: Ryzza'nın verdiği koordinatlara ulaşsan da zekice gizlenmiş zulayı bulmakta zorlanıyorsun. İmparator'un harap olmuş bir heykeli, uzun süre önce yitmiş bir koloninin kalıntılarının ortasında duruyor. Heykelin dibinde zulaya giden gizli geçidi buluyorsun. Zula, İmparatorluk'un kutsal yadigârlarının yer aldığı bir kargoyu içeriyor.
languages.original_text: Even following the coordinates given by Ryzza, you barely manage to find the carefully hidden cache. A dilapidated statue of the Emperor stands among the ruins of a long-dead colony. At its base is a disguised passage to the cache. A cargo of sacred relics of the Imperium is found inside.
